about_the_game:
Fetch: the furry RPG!

A story full of heart and humor!

Fifteen years ago, the Dog Kingdom lost its queen in one of many battles waged against the Cat Kingdom. Now, the prince of the Dog Kingdom wishes to declare peace with the Cats and end this centuries-old conflict once and for all. But first, he must complete his Fetch: the sacred pilgrimage performed by every prospective ruler of the kingdom where they must travel the entire length of their continent in order to retrieve the crown and then bring it back. His motives are pure, but he is naive, and there are many who would rather he didn't make it. Can he achieve his goal? Like... maybe?

Explore and battle in a colorful world!

Travel through varied environments depicted in glorious pixel art inspired by classic handheld games, and encounter enemies on the map to engage them in turn-based battles! Hand-drawn art supplements dialogue scenes to bring the characters to life.

A colorful cast of characters!

The prince will join forces with 6 allies over the course of his journey, each with their own battle mechanics and reason for joining the cause. Complete each character's "Character Quests" to increase their stats and become closer to them. His 5 male allies can even be romanced by the end of the game--or if you're not into that, you can ignore it.

Gems, gems, gems!

In this world, magic energy is contained within gemstones mined from the Earth. Equip different gems to gain access to different kinds of magic in battle, use them to power machines to solve puzzles, or craft them into accessories that expand your options.

Hit 'em where it hurts!

Enemies have elemental weaknesses that you can exploit in order to leave them vulnerable and end a fight quickly. Make sure to Research them before flinging spells like wild; they all have unique descriptions to read, too!

Talk to everyone!

Every nook and cranny of the world is full of NPCs to talk to, closets to look inside, books to read, and drawers to investigate. Take your time and experience all the humor and lore hidden throughout the world! Please! I worked hard on it!

content_descriptors.notes: Fetch includes coarse language and violence. Characters are sometimes depicted in revealing outfits, or in their underwear. There are occasional suggestive images and dialog.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Fetch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Sexuelle Andeutungen

short_description: Find the crown, world peace, yourself, and maybe a boyfriend in this turn-based RPG. Fight and explore your way across the Dog Kingdom while getting to know the off-beat inhabitants of this world steeped in conflict.
